reviewText: Absolutely genius! Played it again and again.
Superb!  Excellent!  Brilliant!  Directing, Writing, Acting, Cinematography, Music all Excel with Outstanding Success!!!!
watch it 20 mins. ago, it is excellent N.RUSSELL  SUN.23TH MAY 2015

The Artist is the best movie I watched in 2013.  I only buy DVD's if they are exceptional enough to watch more than once.  I can envision watching The Artist several times in a year for many years to come.  The Artist is a classic entertaining movie.

Absolutely outstanding on all levels. great performance by the leads. I even loved the dog.
I'll have to catch one of the OSS 117 films that feature this same actor.
I adore this movie. It is so fun and extremely entertaining and you forget that you're watching a silent film. I really enjoy it. Not only a must-watch but a must-own as well!
